lexUnit.name: tasty.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of food) having a pleasant, distinct flavour.

sentence.text: The food was tasty and good .
There were plenty of crumbs to be gathered from around the cheese and scraps of meat and tasty skin to be picked from the carcass of a cooked chicken .
Spicy meat balls with puntalette were tasty but they looked rather lifeless and microwaved ; the sauce could have been a lot more lively .
And customers in one of the UK 's leading supermarkets have been discovering how to produce tasty bread , pizzas and pastries in a special free leaflet distributed in Sainsbury stores .
Rye flour does not rise on its own , but may be mixed with wheat in different proportions and can be baked into a variety of tasty breads .
The chef makes tasty bread rolls and grows his own herbs .
Pasta is quick to prepare , and provides a substantial , tasty meal without too much time and effort .
Though there were tasty meals to be had in Peru -- seafood and chifa ( Chinese ) -- often poor quality or bland ingredients were disguised by chili , herbs and strong seasoning .
Amid Victorian elegance enjoy everything from tasty bar snacks and meals to superb à la carte dinners .
The sickle slowed as it approached , and she imagined the biker licking his lips inside his helmet , anticipating a tasty morsel .
A long plastic tube containing a tasty morsel of food in the middle was placed in their cage .
Or , try our quick and tasty recipe for Goulash ( see far right ) .
You can be a sizzling chef this Guy Fawkes Night with our quick and tasty recipes .
Tasty beef and artichoke salad
Fanworms are a tasty treat for boxfish , puffers , and trigger fish .
For a tasty afternoon treat , try mixing nuts and cherries in a rich toffee and then coat in chocolate to make delicious , crisp florentines .
But there are snags : the buds and leaves of hazel and thorn are tasty when grass is scarce , particularly to inquisitive cattle .
` Tasty free-range chicken . "
In Liguria strong flavours mix with frugal foods for the specialities and hearty fish dishes play a big part -- try ` buridda " , a tasty fish soup .
These tasty little snacks make brilliant finger foods or stylish not appetizers for a party .
Luckily , however , there was a tasty mint and chocolate flavoured cone available to help keep Dibbits cool .
But he told her to stop grumbling and enjoy herself , and she had to admit that the spring lamb with mint sauce was very tasty .
